body_html: Even though TensorFlow says it's using GPU0, it's very likely that it is actually using GPU1. The GPU numbers TensorFlow shows are relative. Run nvidia-smi to check which GPU TF is actually using.
body_text: Even though TensorFlow says it's using GPU0, it's very likely that it is actually using GPU1. The GPU numbers TensorFlow shows are relative. Run nvidia-smi to check which GPU TF is actually using.
body: Even though TensorFlow says it's using GPU0, it's very likely that it is actually using GPU1. The GPU numbers TensorFlow shows are relative. Run `nvidia-smi` to check which GPU TF is actually using.
